mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_tel, mem_name, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_email, mem_regdate) values (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_zipcode}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_email}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select * from tbl_member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
